segments.text: Watching the boy stretch for the cookies, I’m struck by his determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His face is set with concentration, blissfully unaware of the precariousness of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a mix of admiration and fear wash over me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it could hurt him badly, and the water adds to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl’s eager expression, her hope tied up in his success.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This little act of rebellion is so innocent, yet carries such risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope, against all odds, they will escape without incident.
segments.speaker: PAR
